refnamediv.refpurpose: read from standard input and write to standard output and files

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Copy standard input to each FILE, and also to standard output.

listitem.para: append to the given FILEs, do not overwrite
If a FILE is -, copy again to standard output.
GNU coreutils online help: <http://www.gnu.org/software/coreutils/> Report tee translation bugs to <http://translationproject.org/team/>

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para: Written by Mike Parker, Richard M. Stallman, and David MacKenzie.

refsect1.title: SEE ALSO
refsect1.para: The full documentation for tee is maintained as a Texinfo manual. If the info and tee programs are properly installed at your site, the command
should give you access to the complete manual.
